heroDescription: We're building an open-source location tracking solution that prioritizes privacy, transparency, and community collaboration. Join us on this journey.
privacyFirstDescription: Your data stays yours. Full transparency and control over your location information.

communityDrivenDescription: Built by the community, for the community. Your feedback shapes the product.

workingHard: We're working hard to bring you something amazing.
checkBackSoon: Check back soon for updates at wayli.app!
